Zebra-themed clothing line: A rainbow-colored zebra-themed clothing line for both kids and adults, featuring vibrant hoodies, t-shirts, and accessories. The line would be perfect for those who love to express their individuality and add a pop of color to their wardrobe.

Rainbow-colored zebra-shaped cookies: A unique and delicious treat for the adventurous eater, these rainbow-colored zebra-shaped cookies would be a fun twist on the classic cookie. Each cookie would be made with different colored frosting to create a striped effect, giving it a playful and whimsical appearance.

Zebra-printed yoga mats: For the yoga enthusiasts, a rainbow-colored zebra-printed yoga mat would be a stylish and functional addition to their practice. Not only would it add a pop of color to their practice, but it would also provide extra grip and support during their poses.

Rainbow-colored zebra-themed home decor: A set of rainbow-colored zebra-themed home decor items, including throw pillows, blankets, and wall art. These items would add a touch of whimsy and fun to any room, and would be a great conversation starter for guests.

Zebra-printed skateboard: A rainbow-colored zebra-printed skateboard for the adventurous and stylish skateboarder. The vibrant colors and unique design would make it a standout on the skatepark, and the durable construction would ensure it withstands even the most challenging tricks.
